### About

Partial to mountains, snow, and coffee. üèîÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è‚òï

PhD researcher in environmental data science, specializing in the remote sensing and modelling of mountain snow. My work spans the full observational scale: from in-situ fieldwork and UAV surveys to aerial and satellite Earth Observation.

Keen on encouraging more interdiciplinary collaborations founding the [Machine Learning for Geoscience and Earth Observation (Ml4GEO)](https://ml4geo-ed.github.io/) group. I'm also passionate about outreach and effective communication of science, in recent years I've spent a lot of time working on and chairing the [SatSchool Outreach](satschool-outreach.github.io/) project.

- AI & Machine Learning
